comments:
Out of the blue (have been running eclipse for months) I got a 
message "Problems during startup. Check the ".log" file in the ".metadata" 
directory of your workspace."

I checked the .log file and included the last stack trace for your info.  I'm 
not sure what could be causing this.  It's probably something specific to my 
configuration (no one else seems to be having this problem) but not sure what 
it might be, can't point to anything radical that may have happened.

This is a major problem right now as I can't start eclipse.  Please help!!!

Regards

Eric Kaplan
